text: Eadward king gret Alfric biscop and alle mine þeynes on Norfolke & on Suffolke frendlike.

And ic kithe ihu þat ic wille þat Vui abbot be þet minstres wirðe at Seynt Eadmundes biri and alle þinge þe þer to bireth on lande & on sake and on sokne and on alle þinge so ful and so forth so it firmest þider inne lay.
& ic wille þat se freols stonde into þat minstre unawent þe Cnut king þider inne uthe & sithen Hardcnut kyng mine brother.
& ic nelle þat efre ani bisscop ani þing him þeron ateo.
